backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining user profiles, catalog management, carts, orders, KYC data, support messages, and admin‑gated catalog export with mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing deployment‑related features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source file paths to short functional summaries for build planning.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment file setting VITE_APP_ENV to Live for production builds.
frontend/docs/deployment-preflight.md: Documentation describing the deployment preflight checklist to verify environment config and prevent Live deployment failures.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root mount node and script loading the frontend.
frontend/scripts/deployment-preflight.sh: Bash script performing automated preflight checks for environment config, dependencies, backend build, bindings, and frontend build.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application entry configuring TanStack Router routes, layout, theming, and app providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookMediaM: Manages uploading and removing PDF, image, audio, and video files for a book with progress tracking and validation.
Protects admin-only routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing appropriate loading or error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with error handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile before continuing.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: Displays a book preview card with cover, metadata, pricing badges, and a details link, including sold-out logic.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Renders a static generated cover image with a fallback when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/checkout/KycVeri: Handles KYC verification by validating and submitting ID information, showing success or error states.
frontend/src/components/checkout/SelfieC: Placeholder file with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable UI component showing an empty state with optional icon, description, and action.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Shows footer with social links, support chat, and copyright attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders the site header with navigation, user identity info, cart badge, and environment display, using multiple hooks for auth, cart, and balance state.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Wraps the app with header, footer, routed content, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Provides a reusable page container with configurable max width and padding.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Displays purchased book content and media in a dialog with loading, error handling, previews, and download support.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Offers a button to download a purchased book’s PDF, handling permissions, errors, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Implements a customer service chat dialog for submitting questions and viewing threaded support responses.
frontend/src/config/environment.ts: Normalizes build-time environment variables into a Draft or Live environment flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecovery.ts: Provides a mutation to recover admin access with detailed error mapping and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and checking admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Hooks for retrieving token balance and minting tokens with automatic cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and uploading book data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Implements cart-related queries and mutations including adding, removing, checkout, and computing cart totals with book data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalogTransfer.ts: Exports and imports full catalog state and invalidates related caches after import.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and provides identity through context.
frontend/src/hooks/useKyc.ts: Submits document-based KYC proofs and handles backend validation responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Builds the user’s library from orders and books and provides hooks to fetch purchased book content and media.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Contains hooks for fetching individual, user, and all orders from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for organizing query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetStore.ts: Provides an admin store-reset mutation and invalidates all major caches with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Implements support messaging queries and mutations for users and admins with polling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom color palette for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Admin interface for listing, adding, editing, and managing books and their media and content.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Top-level admin dashboard with tabs for catalog, orders, minting, support, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Form allowing admins to mint GLDT tokens to a specified principal.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders with item and customer info for administrative review.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRecoveryPa: Provides UI for recovering admin access, including identity sign-in and recovery flow.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Provides admin UI for resetting, exporting, and importing catalog data with file parsing, validation, and confirmation flows.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Displays customer support message threads and allows admins to reply, refresh, and view message history.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed book info with add‑to‑cart logic, sold‑out handling, and identity checks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows cart items with quantity validation, removal actions, and checkout navigation with auth checks.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Lists all available books with search filtering and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including balance checks, KYC verification, single‑copy validation, and order submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders homepage hero section and a featured books preview pulled from available books.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Displays the user’s purchased books with reading, media access, and download options.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details, including items, total paid, and navigation to library or catalog.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseConfirmationP: Shows a purchase success message and provides navigation to library, order details, or catalog.
frontend/src/utils/catalogTransfer.ts: Validates, parses, and merges catalog export files, supporting overwrite and merge import modes.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Utility functions for downloading files and JSON blobs via browser-triggered downloads.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Provides formatting helpers for token amounts, principals, and dates.
frontend/src/utils/kyc.ts: Handles deriving KYC identifiers and validating document numbers.
Detects KYC-related backend errors and maps them to friendly user messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Generates unique order IDs using timestamp and randomness.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses and validates principal strings using the ICP SDK.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL and session-stored parameters, supporting persistence and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for fixing a production deployment failure in Version 22, including known issues and existing features. Contains metadata, issue list, and deployment-related tasks.
